evidence.claim: Regional Home Care utilizes AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards for data security and patient information privacy.
Integration with EHRs follows FHIR guidelines as part of their health-tech solutions.
X12 transaction processing is part of their workflow for insurance claims.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes HIPAA X12 transactions for healthcare data exchange, aligning with ICP criteria.
